pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.AdminController

  • @Controller
 @Scope(value="session")
 @RequestMapping(value="/adminstrator")
public class AdminController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "errors-and-problems"
    • "configuration"
    • "test-page"
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
